alert.note: Alert for Baker; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 11:58PM EDT until July 22 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Western Baker County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Newton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Pelham, Camilla, Sale City, Hopeful, Hoggard Mill, Cotton, Laney, Hawkinstown, Mimsville, Mitchell Co A/P, Branchville, Hinsonton and Elmodel Wma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
